Program_Title: Rep. Bobby Schilling (R-IL) Speech Supporting the No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion Act

Headlines: Freshman Rep. Bobby Schilling (R-IL), father of ten, speaks from the heart in voicing his support for the No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion Act. Schilling represents Illinois's 17th congressional district, deafeating Rep. Phil Hare last November.
